review: Enjoying this!  Easy to set up.
author: Pamela H. David

review: it was works nice ,but finally retired .

review: Easily set up and tutorial very helpful
author: Tess Stone

review: So great, we took it on vacation and were able to get movies for the kids whenever we needed. Wether it was ordering new movies, or watching their favorite movies on HBO, it worked out great.We will definitely use it more at home to catch up on programming as well.
author: Bob Klane

review: as good as the fire TV box except remove doesn't have voice unless you pay for that remote.  They should include it for both.
author: MTV

review: Love it, wish it included CBS though.
author: Georgette Smith

review: I really don't care for it to be honest. I even signed up for amazon prime to widen my variety but you still have to pay for a ton of stuff (movies, tv shows etc).
author: Katherine
